alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 10:39AM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River At Victoria affecting Victoria County. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River At Victoria. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Fox Road may begin to flood. Water starts backing up in the old river bed at the intersection of Fordyce Road and Old River Road. Timmy``s Crossing begins to flood. Water in the old riverbed will cross under the railroad tracks close to Parsifal and US Business 59, then water will start ponding behind the structures facing Parsifal. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 25.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Guadalupe River Victoria 21.0 11.1 Wed 9 am 25.7 21.3 16.6 11.5 8.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
